data.title: The Famous Last Words of Steve Jobs
data.meta_description: When I go on interviews, I always wear a black turtleneck. It’s sleek, it covers all…assets, it gives me confidence and it pays homage to an innovator I’ve always admired — Steve Jobs. I remember…
data.text:
When I go on interviews, I always wear a black turtleneck. It’s sleek, it covers all…assets, it gives me confidence and it pays homage to an innovator I’ve always admired — Steve Jobs.

I remember having every iPod, watching every product announcement live, and when I could, keeping up with his latest releases.

In my last year of middle school, I witnessed his most impactful product launch Yet.

“Ipod. Phone! Ipod… Phone! Do You Get It Yet? It’s Not Two Products, It’s One! And We Are Calling It, The IPhone.”

- Steve Jobs, 2007
